original_title: DOCUMENTARY of AKB48 No flower without rain 少女たちは涙の後に何を見る？
overview: "No Flower Without Rain" is the 3rd AKB48 documentary. The movie feature various moments of 2012, such as Maeda Atsuko's graduation, Sashihara Rino's transference to HKT48, Oshima Yuko's winning the 4th Senbatsu Election and the Tokyo Dome concert.
title: Documentary of AKB48 No Flower Without Rain
